 Define a function (mapping) with domain and codomain.  Definition 6.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
statement: df-f $p |- ( F : A --> B <-> ( F Fn A /\ ran F C_ B ) ) $.
